Number 2:  Temple Bar
As any Dubliner will tell you,
a pint of Guinness is only as good as the tap
from which it is poured.
So choose your pubs wisely.
Many of Dublin's most historic and legendary
pubs are clustered in an area called Temple Bar.
It's got plenty of character, lots of live music,
and it's a good place to wet your whistle.
Number 3:  Wake Dock

A healthier way to see the city is by bicycle.
